About Me



Hello World! My name is Amit Kulkarni, and I am a first-year CS major at Georgia Tech. I have an avid interest in computer science and technology.

I started learning coding in 8th grade. The languages I first started with were HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I continue to use these languages to modify this website.

Currently, I am focusing most of my efforts in learning and creating new things with Java, Python, Swift, Kotlin, and C++.

Anyways, thanks for visiting my website! Please feel free to contact me with your feedback so that I can continue improving my website.
